reviewText: This movie is based off a real book , but a warning to anyone who has read the book they are nothing alike.  Dean Kane outdoes himself in this family saga as the Uncle who now is faced with raiseing his nephue instead of just babysitting for awhiel.  And then along comes Ben this great big black bear that gives little Kody something to think about then his missing parents.  And then they add in some poachers to the mix.  Although a little preicatable it will soon become a family classic once watched.
Title: Gentle Ben: The Movie

reviewText: Good movie that shows what responability and love really is.  Gentle Ben is a cute bear who any animal lover would like for a pet..
Title: Gentle Ben: The Movie

reviewText: This is a great family movie with excellent actors and a good, clean storyline.  Breath taking scenery as well - I recommend it highly for both children and adults.
Title: Gentle Ben: The Movie

reviewText: I loved this Movie and Gentle Ben 2.  I love the great outdoors.  I guess I'm a tree hugger as other's would say.  There is some excitement as well as humor.  The bear(Bonkers) is amazing.  He certainly has a gentle spirit.  Dean Cain put in a terrific performance.  He's a great actor anyway, no matter what he plays.  I think I have every movie he ever made.  The new boy making his first appearance did extremely well.  All-around good family wathing and it's clean.
Title: Gentle Ben: The Movie

reviewText: Gentle Ben is a fantastic movie for any age.  What a fine family film indeed.  Our Grandchildren are even hooked on Gentle Ben.  It is full of suspense.  The area it was filmed in is gorgeous.
Title: Gentle Ben: The Movie
